The{Chesterfield and North {Derbyshire Royal Hospital}at Calow was opened by the{Queen}in{1985,}having moved from Victorian buildings in the town centre. The Borough is served by 5 other hospitals-{Scarsdale, Walton, {Penmore, Whittington Moor and Mastin {Moor,}in addition to{child clinics. From{Health Centres,}nurses make frequent visits to schools to check on the health and welfare of children. In conversation, our school nurse stressed the importance of routine inspections:-
{a. personal hygiene (hair,nails,teeth { and general cleanliness. {b. growth,weight and adequate sleep. {c. sight,hearing and dental care. Concern for, and regular attention to, health is vital if we are to work and play to the best of our ability.
